docs.snippet: GURFEIN--Stuart "Jim", Beloved husband, father, grandfather, brother, and loyal friend to many passed away at age 65 on March 17th surrounded by immediate family. Born in Scarsdale, NY, Jim graduated from Cornell University where he received a foo...
docs.lead_paragraph: GURFEIN--Stuart "Jim", Beloved husband, father, grandfather, brother, and loyal friend to many passed away at age 65 on March 17th surrounded by immediate family. Born in Scarsdale, NY, Jim graduated from Cornell University where he received a football scholarship. He continued his education with an MBA from Columbia Business School and went on to have a successful and diverse career as an advertising and diamond industry executive before pursuing more entrepreneurial endeavors, creating web based development companies RestaurantRow. com and Mediaspa. Beyond his professional accomplishments, he was an avid golfer, valiant, generous, charitable and fiercely determined. Jim's greatest passion was his family: his wife Kathy, of almost 32 years, whom he married after only knowing for six weeks; his children Scott, Heather and Kody; daughter-in-law, Alison; granddaughter Skye; sister Ronny; and guardian cats, Redford and Brando. Jim will be deeply missed and in our hearts forever. A memorial service is planned for Thursday, March 21st, at 1:00pm at Rye Golf Club, 330 Boston Post Road in Rye, NY.

docs.abstract: Two girls in Steubenville, Ohio, are arrested for posting comments online that threatened victim in recently-concluded rape trial; charges come amid public calls for expanding legal obligations for those who know about a sexual assault, or are in a position to prevent one.

headline.seo: Steubenville Rape Comments Lead to Charges Against Two
